verbose_text: The purpose of the present study was to investigate whether delayed 7-day treatment with hyperforin to post-stroke socially isolated mice can inhibit PSD and PSA via TGF-beta, enhance neurogenesis in the hippocampal dentate gyrus (DG) and consequently improve impaired memory following ischemic stroke.
evidence: hyperforin to post-stroke socially isolated mice can inhibit PSD and PSA via TGF-beta
